sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Logo from '../images/logo.svg' class Course extends React.Component{ state = { } //Get User ID from Local Storage componentDidMount(){ const user = localStorage.getItem('user_id') //User State const [userState, setUserState] = useState({ firstname: "", lastname: "", user_role:"", user_id: "" }) const [state, setState] = useState(false) //Course State const [courseState, setCourseState] = useState({ course_name: "" }) //User Info with Axios.get useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/users/${user}`) .then(response => setUserState({ firstname: response.data[0].firstname, lastname: response.data[0].lastname, user_role: response.data[0].user_role, user_id: response.data[0].user_id })) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) //Course Info with Axios.get useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/courses/${this.props.id}`) .then(response => setCourseState({ course_name: response.data[0].course_name } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) } render(userState, courseState){ return(

{userState.firstname} {userState.lastname}

{userState.user_role}

COURSES
{courseState.course_name}

Course Editor View

New Objective
Select what to search by
Option 1
Option 2
LEARNING OBJECTIVE DOMAIN BLOOM VERBS ACTIVITES
Latin has no def articles... Syntax Recall, Know 3 EDIT
Nouns vary by gender Syntax Recall, Know 5
Nouns vary by person Syntax Recall, Know 3
) } } export default Course;
